info.description: A simple Go service for flight booking management
info.title: Flight Server API

get.description: Get a paginated list of all orders (admin only)
Get a paginated list of all flight schedules (admin only)

post.description: Create a new flight schedule (admin only)

get.description: Get a single flight schedule by its ID

put.description: Update an existing flight schedule (admin only)

get.description: Get a paginated list of airlines
Get all active airlines without pagination
Get a single airline by its ID
Get flight schedules for a specific airline
Get a paginated list of airports
Get a single airport by its IATA code
Search airports by code, city, or name
Get a single airport by its ID

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's information
Search for available flights by origin, destination, and date
Get detailed information about a specific flight
Get a paginated list of orders for the current user

post.description: Create a new flight booking order

get.description: Get a single order by its ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
